PP/10/00968 - Application Dated 23/03/2010
Demolition of two storey addition facing onto Dumbarton Mews and replacing it with new two storey addition, Current access door on Trafalgar Chambers to be removed and infilled with masonry wall and two small windows, alterations to existing front entrance to the fire station including the erection of metal railings, replacing front entrance door and altering of peers height, installation of two air conditioning units within rear passage way.

LB/10/00963 - Application Dated 23/03/2010
Demolition of two storey addition facing onto Dumbarton Mews and replacing it with new two storey addition, Current access door on Trafalgar Chambers to be removed and infilled with masonry wall and two small windows, alterations to existing front entrance to the fire station including the erection of metal railings, replacing front entrance door and altering of peers height, installation of two air conditioning units within rear passage way and internal alterations in association with the site conversion to sleep studies centre.
description: Introduction of new, non-illuminated, signage above main entrance. Replacement of existing signage to left of main entrance with matching non-illuminated, signage above main entrance. Reconfiguration of existing stud partitions for conversion of Ensuite bedrooms to consult examination rooms.
